publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3419# Michael Matheson: Closure of Prison Officers' Social Club at HM Prison Polmont—That the Parliament notes the decision by the Scottish Prison Service (SPS) to close the officers’ social club at HM Prison Polmont and considers that SPS should withdraw this decision and honour its commitment to allow the club to purchase the property, recognising the important role of the club to both staff and the local community. Supported by: Andrew Wilson*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-3419# Closure of Prison Officers' Social Club at HM Prison Polmont (lodged on 24 September 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Alex Neil*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3419# Closure of Prison Officers' Social Club at HM Prison Polmont (lodged on 24 September 2002) Cathy Peattie*

S1M-3419# Michael Matheson: Closure of Prison Officers' Social Club at HM Prison Polmont—That the Parliament notes the decision by the Scottish Prison Service (SPS) to close the officers’ social club at HM Prison Polmont and considers that SPS should withdraw this decision and honour its commitment to allow the club to purchase the property, recognising the important role of the club to both staff and the local community.Supported by: Andrew Wilson, Mr Gil Paterson, Stewart Stevenson, Alex Neil, Tommy Sheridan, Cathy Peattie, Dennis Canavan*
S1M-3419# Closure of Prison Officers' Social Club at HM Prison Polmont (lodged on 24 September 2002) Donald Gorrie*

S1M-3419# Closure of Prison Officers' Social Club at HM Prison Polmont (lodged on 24 September 2002) Fergus Ewing*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Brian Adam*, Ms Sandra White*, Christine Grahame*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-3419# Closure of Prison Officers' Social Club at HM Prison Polmont (lodged on 24 September 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Mr Andrew Welsh*
S1M-3419# Closure of Prison Officers' Social Club at HM Prison Polmont (lodged on 24 September 2002) Roseanna Cunningham*

S1M-3419# Michael Matheson: Closure of Prison Officers' Social Club at HM Prison Polmont—That the Parliament notes the decision by the Scottish Prison Service (SPS) to close the officers’ social club at HM Prison Polmont and considers that SPS should withdraw this decision and honour its commitment to allow the club to purchase the property, recognising the important role of the club to both staff and the local community.Supported by: Andrew Wilson, Mr Gil Paterson, Stewart Stevenson, Alex Neil, Tommy Sheridan, Cathy Peattie, Dennis Canavan, Donald Gorrie, Fergus Ewing, Mr Adam Ingram, Brian Adam, Ms Sandra White, Christine Grahame, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Andrew Welsh, Roseanna Cunningham, Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3419# Closure of Prison Officers' Social Club at HM Prison Polmont (lodged on 24 September 2002) Kay Ullrich*, Robin Harper*
